tool_description: Detect fraud in real time by checking IPs reputation, Proxy/VPN/TOR , BOT, and more...
name: FraudSentinel
title: FraudSentinel

api_list.name: FraudSentinel
api_list.description: Detailed JSON data from hundreds of IP classification databases.

utterances.utterance: Check the reputation of the IP address 192.168.1.1.
Is the IP address 10.0.0.1 associated with any fraudulent activity?
Can you verify if the IP address 172.16.254.1 is using a proxy or VPN?
Check the IP address 203.0.113.195 for any TOR network usage.
Is the IP address 198.51.100.1 flagged as a BOT?
Analyze the IP address 192.0.2.1 for any potential fraud without using cached data.
Perform a detailed fraud check on the IP address 203.0.113.1 with paranoid mode enabled.
Check if the IP address 198.51.100.2 is involved in any suspicious activities.
Verify the IP address 192.168.0.1 for any known fraud cases.
Is the IP address 10.0.0.2 using any anonymizing services like TOR or VPN?
